trait.name: Bloodied Frenzy
entries: While {@status Bloodied|XPHB}, the berserker has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls and saving throws.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The berserker makes three attacks, using Greataxe or Javelin in any combination.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) Slashing damage, plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Thunder damage to the target or another creature within 5 feet of the target.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) Piercing damage, and the target's {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} decreases by 5 feet until the start of the berserker's next turn.
